title: The Panther's Pet
alternative_title: 黒ヒョウ様のお気に入り ; Le partenaire de la panthère noire
status: 黒ヒョウ様のお気に入り ; Le partenaire de la panthère noire
description:
Description :
        In a world where beastmen and humans coexist, Gaku attends a college that consists of mainly beastman, a rarity in the world. Despite being the subject of his study, he's still not had much close interaction with them... That is until a chance encounter under the tree with Rui. Rui's the resident troublemaker who just so happens to be a leopard beastman. Soon a casual favor quickly leads Gaku into catching the eye of real predator!+
